Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.job

Interface ApplicantService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantServiceImpl
public interface ApplicantService
Service interface for managing job applicants. Provides methods to perform operations related to job applicants.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

  • Method Details

    • createApplicant

      Applicant createApplicant(String firstName, String lastName, String streetAddress, String city, String state, String zip, String phone, String email, UUID jobID, URL resume)
      Create a new applicant with the given details.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the applicant
      lastName - the last name of the applicant
      streetAddress - the street address of the applicant
      city - the city of the applicant
      state - the state of the applicant
      zip - the ZIP code of the applicant
      phone - the phone number of the applicant
      email - the email address of the applicant
      jobID - the ID of the job applied for
      resume - the URL of the applicant's resume
      Returns:
      the created applicant

    • getApplicantByID

      Applicant getApplicantByID(UUID applicantID)
      Get an applicant by their ID.
      Parameters:
      applicantID - the ID of the applicant
      Returns:
      the found applicant, or null if not found

    • getAllApplicants

      List<Applicant> getAllApplicants()
      Get all applicants.
      Returns:
      a list of all applicants

    • updateApplicant

      Applicant updateApplicant(UUID applicantID, String firstName, String lastName, String streetAddress, String city, String state, String zip, String phone, String email, UUID jobID, URL resume)
      Update the details of an existing applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantID - the ID of the applicant to update
      firstName - the updated first name
      lastName - the updated last name
      streetAddress - the updated street address
      city - the updated city
      state - the updated state
      zip - the updated ZIP code
      phone - the updated phone number
      email - the updated email address
      jobID - the updated job ID
      resume - the updated resume URL
      Returns:
      the updated applicant, or null if not found

    • deleteApplicant

      boolean deleteApplicant(UUID applicantID)
      Delete an applicant by their ID.
      Parameters:
      applicantID - the ID of the applicant to delete
      Returns:
      true if the applicant was successfully deleted, false otherwise
